Virgo Framework Rendering Template

Creating a Dynamic Route

create a function with an extra parameter. Pass the extra parameter into the routes. 

                    
# apps/profile/routes.py

from virgo.core.routing import routes
from virgo.core.response import Response, redirect
from virgo.core.template import render


def profile_page(request, name):
    return Response(f"This is {name}'s profile")
routes["/profile/<name>"] = profile_page

Run the Server

When you access 127.0.0.1:8000/profile/John you should see:

                    
This is John's profile
